actionUnits.condition: In the provided Maze.unity excerpt, GameObject 'Maze' (fileID 108149588) has no Rigidbody, Collider, EventTrigger, or MonoBehaviour component blocks. Therefore, there are no UnityEvents (m_Calls) or public methods exposed to trigger. To proceed, please provide the MonoBehaviour component(s) attached to 'Maze' including their component fileID(s), any UnityEvent m_Calls entries, and the script source details. Alternatively, if interactions are via physics or EventTrigger, 'Maze' needs a Collider and/or EventTrigger. If logic is on children, please share details for children: [1018490869, 2063458771, 1591958095, 33954587, 779621953].

EventTrigger (fileID 114000011833207400) on MyWaypoint (PrefabInstance fileID 1633604867) has m_Delegates eventID 0 mapped to Waypoint.Enter() on MonoBehaviour (fileID 114000013353947326; script guid 18f754fc3d17b49db8e3d3dde994b993). BoxCollider (fileID 65000011506705274) present. This simulates pointer enter to transition state Idle -> Focused. Serialized fields in scene match script: material, lerp_* speeds, scale_* ranges, rotation_speed, clip_click, threshold.
EventTrigger eventID 1 mapped to Waypoint.Exit() (fileID 114000013353947326). This simulates pointer exit to transition Focused -> Idle (Exit only affects state when currently Focused).

EventTrigger eventID 4 mapped to Waypoint.Click() (fileID 114000013353947326). This simulates pointer click: state Idle/Focused -> Clicked, AudioSource plays clip_click, then via Update transitions to Approaching when scaled, calling Hide() and Approach(). Approach() moves GameObject.Find("Camera Holder") (fileID 241368711) to waypoint _initial_position + (0,0.7,0), leading to Occupied state once camera reaches target.

Simulate EventTrigger PointerClick (EventTrigger id=791898216, eventID=4) whose m_Calls invokes Crystal.Touch on MonoBehaviour id=791898217. Allow time for greeting audio to finish so speechBubble Canvas can be enabled.
Invoke TakeCoins to branch based on coins in scene. If any GameObjects tagged 'Coin' exist, dialog_fail is shown; otherwise dialog_teleport is shown.
Invoke Teleport regardless of dialog state to exercise teleport sound and _teleporting flow. Allow time for teleport_sound to finish so Update() sets dialog_end active and resets _teleporting.
Restart the scene to exercise SceneManager.LoadScene(0). Place last to avoid interrupting prior steps.
